TOUR_GUIDE.WEBSITE_LOGO_INTRO: It will return you to the home screen with the most recently viewed category.
TOUR_GUIDE.WIDGETS_INTRO: You will be able to add multiple modules on a single screen. it will help you organize your tasks efficiently.
TOUR_GUIDE.HOME_INTRO: The Home section provides access to all available categories on a single page.
TOUR_GUIDE.AI_INTRO: You will be able to use Artificial intelligence for questions and suggestions.
TOUR_GUIDE.NEWS_INTRO: You can watch the Quasar Integrated News here.
TOUR_GUIDE.TRADING_INTRO: The Trading section provides various tools and integrations for investing and learning about trading.
TOUR_GUIDE.CRYPTO_INTRO: The Crypto section will provide insights and comprehensive information on cryptocurrency coins and also platform to buy and sell the coins.
TOUR_GUIDE.WEATHER_INTRO: You can check the weather and plan accordingly.
TOUR_GUIDE.SPORTS_INTRO: The Sports section will provide insights and information about various games and matches.
TOUR_GUIDE.CHAT_INTRO: You will be able to chat and create/attend meetings with other users within the platform.
TOUR_GUIDE.PROFILE_INTRO: You can change and update your profile settings by using this.
TOUR_GUIDE.YOUTUBE_INTRO: You can remove YouTube streaming by purchasing a premium subscription.
TOUR_GUIDE.ADVERTISEMENT_INTRO: You can buy the Quasar Markets Premium Plan to avoid advertisement.
TOUR_GUIDE.FULL_SCREEN_INTRO: This will allow you to experience the widget in full screen.
TOUR_GUIDE.SHARE_LAYOUT_INTRO: This will help share your share the layout with your friends within the platform.
TOUR_GUIDE.EDIT_LAYOUT_INTRO: This will help you change screens, reset, delete, and rename layout.
TOUR_GUIDE.ADD_SCREEN_INTRO: You can add different screens to add different modules by this.
TOUR_GUIDE.RENAME_LAYOUT_INTRO: This will help you rename layout with your friends within the platform.
TOUR_GUIDE.DELETE_LAYOUT_INTRO: This will help you delete the layout you dont need.
TOUR_GUIDE.RESET_LAYOUT_INTRO: You can remove all the widgets at a time of particular layout.
TOUR_GUIDE.SAVE_LAYOUT_INTRO: You can save the layout in which you have added the different widgets.
TOUR_GUIDE.TRADING_CENTRAL_INTRO: This will provide insight into stock markets for you to build better strategies.
TOUR_GUIDE.STRATEGY_BUILDER_INTRO: This feature enables you to delve into diverse stock insights within a designated category.
TOUR_GUIDE.MARKET_BUZZ_INTRO: This feature will provide you with a curated list of trending stocks, indices, and cryptocurrencies.
TOUR_GUIDE.TECHNICAL_INSIGHTS_INTRO: This feature enables you to access technical insights for each stock, indicating their trend direction, whether upward or downward.
TOUR_GUIDE.TRADING_CENTRAL_NEWS_INTRO: This feature will provide you with a curated list of trending stocks, indices, and cryptocurrencies.
TOUR_GUIDE.MARKET_FUNDAMENTAL_INTRO: Easily access fundamental and statistical information about companies to make informed investment decisions.
TOUR_GUIDE.OVERVIEW_INTRO: It will give you statistical overview about this company.
TOUR_GUIDE.FINANCIALS_INTRO: It will provide you financials about a particular company to help you make better understanding
TOUR_GUIDE.HOLDINGS_INTRO: It will provide you with knowledge about different shares held with value and change with that.
TOUR_GUIDE.BOOKMAP_INTRO: This tool provides visualization of market liquidity, offering valuable insights into the order book.
TOUR_GUIDE.ADD_MODULE_INTRO: You can add different modules in Bookmap for different securities.
TOUR_GUIDE.AIERA_INTRO: The premium version unlocks access to this module, enabling you to monitor live, recent, and upcoming tonal events.
TOUR_GUIDE.LIVE_EVENTS_INTRO: This feature provides real-time financial events from around the world.
TOUR_GUIDE.RECENT_EVENTS_INTRO: You will be able to view recent financial events that have occurred worldwide.
TOUR_GUIDE.UPCOMING_EVENTS_INTRO: You can find upcoming financial events from around the world here.
TOUR_GUIDE.TONAL_EVENTS_INTRO: You can find numerical indicators of stock prices, indices, or securities in this event.
TOUR_GUIDE.EARNINGS_FILTER_INTTRO: You can filter and view only earning-related events by using this tick box.
TOUR_GUIDE.TRANSCRIPT_INTRO: You can view only those events for which transcripts are available.
TOUR_GUIDE.WATCHLIST_INTRO: With this module, you can compile a watchlist of various stocks tailored to your interests and investment goals.
TOUR_GUIDE.ADD_WATCHLIST_INTRO: Add your stocks into different watchlists based on your preferences and investment strategies.
TOUR_GUIDE.WEATHER_TYPE_INTRO: Now you can view a comprehensive summary including air quality index, pollen levels, pollutants and many more all in one platform.
TOUR_GUIDE.COINALYZE_INTRO: This module provides comprehensive information on cryptocurrency coins, allowing you to stay updated on all relevant details.
TOUR_GUIDE.OPEN_INTEREST_INTRO: You can see the open interest of active contracts for an asset, like a cryptocurrency, at a given time.
TOUR_GUIDE.FUNDING_RATE_INTRO: The funding rate is the interest rate charged or paid for holding leveraged positions overnight.
TOUR_GUIDE.PREDICTED_FUNDING_RATE_INTRO: You can view the current predicted funding rate, which represents the interest rate charged or received for holding leveraged positions overnight on a crypto platform.
TOUR_GUIDE.TIMEZONE_INTRO: You have the feature of multiple timezone.
TOUR_GUIDE.ADD_TIMEZONE_INTRO: You can add multiple time zones to monitor and trade accordingly.
TOUR_GUIDE.ALPHA_CAPTURA_INTRO: Explore various indices published by countries through this feature.
TOUR_GUIDE.TIME_INTRO: This will show you the time of the indices published by the respective country.
TOUR_GUIDE.IMPACT_INTRO: This represents the names of the indices published by the respective country.
TOUR_GUIDE.EVENT_INTRO: This represents the names of the indices published by the respective country.
TOUR_GUIDE.ACTUAL_INTRO: This will show the actual price of the indices.
TOUR_GUIDE.FORECAST_INTRO: This will show the predicted price of the indices.
TOUR_GUIDE.PREVIOUS_INTRO: This will show the previous price of the indices.
TOUR_GUIDE.TREASURY_INTRO: This dropdown allows you to select and display securities of a specific type.
TOUR_GUIDE.TYPE_INTRO: This dropdown allows you to select and display securities of a specific type.
TOUR_GUIDE.SEARCH_INTRO: This feature enables you to search for the CUSIP number of various bonds and securities.
TOUR_GUIDE.UNBATED_INTRO: You can view the odds and betting lines for different sports and games using this module.
TOUR_GUIDE.SPORTWISE_INTRO: This module enables you to access insights on various sports, teams, and players.
TOUR_GUIDE.START_INTRO: You create a new layout by using this and it will be saved when you add some module.

AI_TOUR_GUIDE.DATA_SOURCE_INTRO: The Quasar Markets platform integrates multiple financial Data Sources like FRED, EDGAR, World Economic Forum, and Cloudquant.
AI_TOUR_GUIDE.GENRIC_FEEDBACK_INTRO: Users have the option to provide feedback for the AI.
AI_TOUR_GUIDE.TRENDING_KEYWORDS_INTRO: On the dashboard, there is an option for Trending Keywords, which displays a bar graph showing the most frequently used or trending keywords by users on the platform.
AI_TOUR_GUIDE.LIVE_FEED_INTRO: The Live Feed feature enables users to view the recently asked 15 questions on the platform by any user.
AI_TOUR_GUIDE.SAVED_QUESTIONS_INTRO: Users can save the asked question for future use.
AI_TOUR_GUIDE.SCHEDULE_INTRO: Users can save asked questions for future use and, in turn, schedule a question either from the Live Feed or from their saved questions.
AI_TOUR_GUIDE.NEW_CHAT_INTRO: Users can click on New Chat and start asking their queries.
AI_TOUR_GUIDE.CHAT_HISTORY_INTRO: Users can view their chat history threads.
AI_TOUR_GUIDE.RECENTLY_ASKED_INTRO: Users can view the list of recently asked questions.
AI_TOUR_GUIDE.SAVED_QUESTIONS_LISTING_INTRO: Users can view the list of saved questions.
AI_TOUR_GUIDE.LOGOUT_INTRO: Users can click on the Log out button to log out of the platform.

INTRINO_TERMS.NASDAQ_AGREEMENT_INTRO: Enter your details for the second step.
INTRINO_TERMS.OPRA_AGREEMENT_INTRO: Enter your contact information to start the signing process.
INTRINO_TERMS.VALIDATION_SIGNATURE_LENGTH: Signature text cannot be greater than 40 characters.
INTRINO_TERMS.PLACEHOLDER_PERSON_SIGNING: Name of Person signing on behalf of subscriber firm
INTRINO_TERMS.VALIDATION_US/CANADIAN_STATUS: US Canadian Subscriber Status is required.
INTRINO_TERMS.JOIN_MESSAGE: Join as a Professional or Non Professional
INTRINO_TERMS.PROFESSIONAL_DESC: Licensed traders, institutions, or individuals using data for commercial purposes.
INTRINO_TERMS.NON_PROFESSIONAL_DESC: Individual investors using data for personal, non-commercial research.
INTRINO_TERMS.PROFESSIONAL_DEFINITION: Professional: Any person that meets any of the following criteria:
INTRINO_TERMS.PROFESSIONAL_ITEM1: Is registered or qualified with: the Securities and Exchange Commission, the Commodities Futures Trading Commission, any state securities agency, any securities exchange or association, or any commodities or futures contract market or association.
INTRINO_TERMS.PROFESSIONAL_ITEM2: Is engaged as an "investment advisor" as that term is defined in Section 201(11) of the Investment Advisor's Act of 1940 (whether or not registered or qualified under that Act).
INTRINO_TERMS.PROFESSIONAL_ITEM3: Is employed by a bank or another organization that is exempt from registration under Federal and/or state securities laws to perform functions that would require him or her to be so registered or qualified if he or she were to perform such functions for an organization not so exempt.
INTRINO_TERMS.NON_PROFESSIONAL_DEFINITION: Non-Professional: Any natural person and cannot be a corporation, trust, organization, institution or partnership account.
